price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߘߊ߰ߡߎ߲߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߕߘߍ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߠߊ߫ ߏ߬ ߡߊ߫ ߝߏߦߌ߫ ߢߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يُمَتَّعُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yumattaʿūna
